trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cache entry in the cache.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem> class provides a logical representation of a cache entry, which can include regions by using the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem.RegionName%2A> property.
In the default ASP.NET cache implementation, a cache entry is a key/value pair.
Entries in the cache are not <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem> instances.
Instead, the cache provider can store cache entries in any internal format that is convenient.
However, the cache API requires cache providers to be able to convert cache entries into <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem> instances (and vice versa).
Custom cache implementations can inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem> class provide additional information about cache entries.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance using the specified key of a cache entry.

When the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem.%23ctor%28System.String%29> method overload is called, the property values for <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem.RegionName%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem.Value%2A> are set to `null`.
A unique identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance using the specified key and a value of the cache entry.

When the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29> method overload is called, the property value for <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem.RegionName%2A> is set to `null`.
A unique identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
The data for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance using the specified key, value, and region of the cache entry.
A unique identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
The data for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
The name of a region in the cache that will contain the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
Gets or sets a unique identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance.
The identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance.
Gets or sets the name of a region in the cache that contains a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> entry.
The name of a region in a cache.
The default is `null`.
Gets or sets the data for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance.
The data for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem"></xref> instance.
The default is `null`.
